name: MMO prototype
description:
This is the client-side build for a MMO prototype stress test.

Don't worry too much about making a cool username and secure passwords...  all account information currently gets wiped when the server shuts down for maintenance or updates.  If you get stuck, don't hesitate to create a new account.

Controls:

WASD controls.  [Left-SHIFT] to sprint.  No jumping yet.  If you encounter another player, press [N] to share your name with them.

Place Object:

Press [P] and then, using the 0-to-3 keys to select which item to place down, you can aim by looking around and press [F] to place the object down.

Move Object:

Press [M], look at the object, press [E] to select, look at another location and press [F] to place the object down.

Remove Object:

Press [M], look at the object, press [E] to select, press [E] again to remove.

Interact:

Look at the object and press [E].
